TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LicenseUsageMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies when the can be used.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> classes use this enumeration. It is used to set a component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>. See the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager> class for details.
For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode Designtime = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Used during design time by a visual designer or the compiler.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode Runtime = int32(0)
